// Place your key bindings in this file to override the defaults
[
    {
        "key": "ctrl+shift+z",
        "command": "workbench.action.tasks.runTask",
        "args": "build && tree"
    },

    {
        "key": "ctrl+shift+x",
        "command": "workbench.action.tasks.runTask",
        "args": "build && run"
    },

    {
        "key": "ctrl+shift+c",
        "command": "workbench.action.tasks.runTask",
        "args": "clean && tree"
    }
]
